attributes.action: Give British citizens the choice to Become an EU citizen instead of British.
attributes.additional_details: All people from the UK voted for what they thought right, the majority won. Fair. But I don't want part of it. I don't identify with the majority of British people and I wish to be a Europian not British as its a sign of inclusive progressive accepting people.
attributes.background: I've been a British citizen all my life, also been a Europian all my life, I'd like the opportunity to continue being a Europian with the benefits of being such as I don't identify with what Great Britain (England,Wales) voted for! I want to be identified as europian and an EU passport and rights.
